fingerprint: House 10-4, Assessment 727, 190 Sq.Yds, Gift Deed 61/2026, Gramakantam, Adsarlapadu Village, Vemsoor Mandal, SATHUPALLY SRO, Wife from Husband
ec_summary: EC shows single Gift Deed transaction 61/2026. Property is Gramakantam land with RCC building (400 Sq.Ft built-up). House Tax Assessment details verified via Telangana Panchayat portal. Owner name shows as Lanka Venkateswararao in HTR.
review_notes: L2 accepted. Name variation between Venkateswarlu and Venkateswararao is acceptable - same person confirmed via Aadhaar. Both names used interchangeably in Telugu transliteration. Declaration attached clarifying the name variation. Gift from husband to wife for natural love and affection - standard pattern.
exceptions: Do not flag: Venkateswarlu vs Venkateswararao vs Venkateswara Rao name variations - common Telugu transliteration issue. Do not flag: Father's name written as husband's name in some records - data entry variation. Gramakantam property type is acceptable - just ensure disclosed in report.
